thread.section_title: KILL CLIFF Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KILL CLIFF | killcliff.com
thread.title: Buck Billings
thread.title_full: KILL CLIFF reviewed by Buck Billings

author: Buck Billings
title: Buck Billings
text: Kill Cliff always has good quality products and I really like the s/h included in the pricing. I've ordered recovery drinks, cold brew, shorts for my wife, and a couple of t-shirts. We've been pleased with everything. I do think it'd be cool if you guys tossed in a sticker or something with the cases, but oh well. Overall, very pleased, I'll be back when I run out of drinks!
